parameter.name: name
parameter.label: Name
parameter.description: The name of one specific device. You can also use the description.

parameter.name: additionalFilters
parameter.label: Additional Filters
parameter.description: Additional filters to select the proper device on the pulseaudio server, in case of ambiguity. To be selected, the device should have at least a property value matching this regular expression. You can use multiple regular expressions (separator is ###).

parameter.name: activateSimpleProtocolSource
parameter.label: Create an Audio Source with simple-protocol-tcp
parameter.description: Activation of a corresponding source in OpenHAB (module-simple-protocol-tcp must be available on the pulseaudio server)

parameter.name: simpleProtocolSourcePort
parameter.label: Simple Protocol Port
parameter.description: Default Port to allocate to be used by module-simple-protocol-tcp on the pulseaudio server

parameter.name: simpleProtocolSourceIdleTimeout
parameter.label: Idle Timeout
parameter.description: Timeout in ms after which the connection will be closed when no stream is running. This ensures that your speaker is not on all the time and the pulseaudio source can go to idle mode. -1 for no disconnection.

parameter.name: simpleProtocolSourceFormat
parameter.label: Simple Protocol Format
parameter.description: The audio format to be used by module-simple-protocol-tcp on the pulseaudio server

parameter.name: simpleProtocolSourceRate
parameter.label: Simple Protocol Rate
parameter.description: The audio sample rate to be used by module-simple-protocol-tcp on the pulseaudio server

parameter.name: simpleProtocolSourceChannels
parameter.label: Simple Protocol Channels
parameter.description: The audio channel number to be used by module-simple-protocol-tcp on the pulseaudio server

parameter.name: simpleProtocolSOTimeout
parameter.label: Simple Protocol SO Timeout
parameter.description: Socket SO timeout when connecting to pulseaudio server though module-simple-protocol-tcp. You can tune this option if the socket disconnect frequently.
